meanings.definition: (Latin) I lead back, bring back, reduce
meanings.english_definition: (Latin) I lead back, bring back, reduce

etymology.value: From Latin re- (back, again) + duco (I lead).

usage_notes.explanation: This is a Latin verb, first-person singular present active indicative of 'reducere'. It's not commonly used in modern English except in specialized contexts or as a root for other words.
